title: Starting Over
description: New term, new school - but India Jane isn't looking forward to being the new girl in Year Eleven. Everyone else already has their circle of friends and India Jane feels like she's on the outside looking in. At least she's at the same school as Joe, the boy she met on holiday in Greece, and she's hoping that they may become more than just friends. But the paths of true love and friendship never seem to run very smoothly...
author: Cathy Hopkins
